name: PumpkinJumping
description:
I've made this game for the 0 hours game jam, you have to do a Game in one hour.

In this hour I've made all the assets and the programation of the game, the game design was maded before.

Please, enjoy.

Move with AWSD and Space, you will move to the direction you are looking.

Awake the other Pumpinks with F (from fire), awake all the pumpkings to win.
